Message: It was noisy in the town square.

All the witches I found
were rounded up.

As I stood there
with my heart racing,
the Pope quietly spoke...

The next moment,
the Knights raised
their swords in unison.

It wouldn’t be long before
this horrendous act was
repeated in every corner
of the world.

Was this the reason
she made me use my powers—
the reason she called out to me
on the street...?

They’re different from
the eyes I see now,
beaming as witches
are executed.

My cards reveal to me
someone else who bears
the fate of The World
on his shoulders.
